The user places a seal on a person. When the target gets near a sealing tag, the target will be secured by red chakra threads, binding them in place. The technique can last for hours on its own. It can also be released by a [[Seal of Confrontation]].

== Trivia ==
* In the manga adaptation, the seal is depicted as a cherry blossom petal.
